education.degree: Bachelor of Science  in Finance (Second Major: Mathematics)

experience.description: Full-time, 40 hours per week, GS-7 equivalent

achievements.text: Reviewed, analyzed, and evaluated economic policies and programs, aligning with the role’s requirements for analyzing financial and administrative systems
Created and implemented economic models to support policy decisions, showcasing skills in research, forecasting, and program evaluation
Prepared detailed financial reports and projections for management, including monthly and quarterly updates, akin to preparing Status of Funds reports
Improved data processing efficiency by 50% through automation, demonstrating a strong ability to optimize financial workflows and systems
Collaborated with cross-functional teams and presented findings to leadership, reflecting excellent communication and teamwork
Managed operations generating over $250,000 annually, including financial tracking and resource allocation
Automated processes using Visual Basic and Power BI, improving efficiency and reducing operational errors—skills applicable to streamlining administrative systems
Reconciled accounts and generated detailed financial insights, similar to reviewing payroll and transaction reports
Managed all financial operations, including revenue forecasting, expense tracking, and budgeting
Designed data-driven strategies to optimize business processes, resulting in increased efficiency and higher customer retention
Developed year-end financial projections and reports using historical and current data, closely mirroring FMMI year-end estimate preparation
